titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Buildings Motion Picture Showing Former Sites and Replacements
Yale Buildings Showing Former Sites and Replacements
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:40

did.unittitle: Yale buildings motion picture showing former sites and replacements

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The motion picture film depicts Yale building sites and construction. Buildings documented include South Sheffield, gymnasium, Sloane Laboratory, Divinity School, Park Street dormitories, Graduate School, Law School, Sterling Memorial Library, Forestry School, Branford Court, and Harkness Tower.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 46-A (YRG 46-A), Records and materials broadly documenting Yale buildings, facilities, and grounds.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The item was a gift of M. G. Blakeslee, Jr., 2006.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy for their personal use should consult Copying Services information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Buildings Motion Picture Showing Former Sites and Replacements (RU 1009). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The motion picture film depicts Yale building sites and construction. Buildings documented include South Sheffield, gymnasiums, Sloane Laboratory, Divinity School, Park Street dormitories, Graduate School, Law School, Sterling Memorial Library, Forestry School, Branford Court, and Harkness Tower.

did.unittitle: Yale buildings showing former sites and replacements [motion picture]
